Baby-Sitter Simulator with a playerbase of failed Twitch streamers. Your reward for humoring these societal lampreys according to their imaginary rules is derision from the most out-of-touch developers this side of EA. To all people playing Killer in 2022, I salute you. To everyone else, stay away.
+可以说是恐怖游戏里面最好玩的了，无论外面怎么抄袭模仿这个游戏，都没有这个游戏的版权之多，恐怖的精髓也抄不过去的，就是希望多点玩家玩就好了，真的是非常尊重中国玩家的游戏了！！！春节的时候玩氛围也是满满的，一家人开黑玩人类，又或者是大家排排坐看亲戚玩屠夫，时隔多年捡回这个游戏还是好玩啊

¿Cómo ser más feliz y disfrutar de una vida más saludable?
1-Sé más honesto y comunicativo. 
2-No reprimas muestras de cariño. 
3-Trabaja tu empatía. 
4-Ayuda a los demás. 
5-Da siempre algo a los demás.
6-Aprende a dejar ir lo que no te hace bien. 
7-Y disfruta de ti mismo.
8-Compra y juga este juego, es buenísimo. No te arrepentirás.

I absolutely despise this game. I honestly cannot fathom how the developers made such an intriguing concept and fun core mechanics, and manage to screw up literally everything else from map RNG to basic game balance. It is, unfortunately, too late for me. I see my hours, you see my hours, this game is a digital Stockholm Syndrome. Do yourself a favor and never play this, you'll be stuck in an endless circle of misery.

Okay so I've played this game enough to have a good understanding of both sides, killer and survivor. This game sucks, and I can't stop playing it. I don't think this game is as survivor side as most, and this is coming from someone who predominately plays killer. I think killer is MUCH harder than survivor however, because you can make less mistakes and the few you do can be punished harder. Even with this said, playing killer very well with sweaty perks can still crush seemingly unbeatable swfs. Don't get me wrong, the game is very unhealthy because of this and beating high level survivors has to be done with extremely sweaty and sometimes unfun methods, but there is a way. On the survivor hand, easier gameplay doesn't mean more fun. Almost all of my games I go against people who hard camp and hard tunnel, and when I inevitably play super altruistic to have some fun I always end up as the person rotting away on the hook. After these games, my MMR goes down and then I play against baby killers who I can't even have fun against because they're just not good enough to loop. This is mostly the reason I play killer, because no matter how many baby survivors there are there's always at least one who can hold their own in chase, which is where the most fun comes from. Now even though this game is extremely flawed and has a dev team that doesn't know what's even happening with it, I keep coming back to it for some reason. The lows are everywhere and hard to avoid but the highs are just too good to pass up. I can't tell you how satisfying it is to crush a bully swf on a hard match until you've done it yourself. Now it's time to talk about the que times. They suck. Because killer is so much harder to play and the majority of people lean towards survivor gameplay (probably because it's easier to do well), the amount of waiting to get a survivor game is abysmal. This is another reason I play killer, because killer matches can be obtained in less than a minute, but I've sometimes watched entire youtube videos while waiting for survivor matches. Oh hey I almost forgot about the community. IT SUCKS. Toxicity in the game is as commonplace as bad solo teammates, which is to say it's EVERYWHERE. I notice it mostly among the survivors, as I've rarely seen killers who go out of the way to be toxic, unlike survivors. I'm not talking about clicking or teabagging, that's just a tool survivors use to get a killers attention. I'm talking about the endgame chat, and I've had games where the entire team is on me about slugging and such. I rarely camp and tunnel, but I do main Oni so slugging with infectious fright is something I do a lot. When I camp, it's usually because I've controlled health states to make the person I want go for the rescue, which rarely happens because of medkits and circle of healing. When I tunnel, it's because someone tried desperately to force DS on me, in which case I punish the dumb gameplay by just going after them after getting hit with the DS. If the person recently unhooked tries to get away and doesn't run directly into my face, I'll always go after the unhooker. But survivor mains will find ANYTHING, and I mean ANYTHING to complain about. There's a lot of survivors I respect, and when someone makes a good play I will call it out to myself and maybe even complement them in the endgame chat. Survivors, however, will just ignore any good plays I make and just go "baby killer" when they can't find anything I did wrong. I don't know why survivor mains are so much more whiny, but maybe it's just because there's more survivors and I just don't see a lot of toxic killers. But the WORST kind of survivor is one that gives up on hook or dc's when they've been outplayed (also something weird I've noticed is the survivors who DC like this ALWAYS are either running a map offering, or the perk Iron Will.), because it just screwes their team over for the rest of the game. In conclusion, the community sucks, the game is imbalanced, winning as either side requires use of unfun sweaty perks and boring gameplay choices, and it's fun as shit for some reason. I recognize why anyone would slam this game with a bad review because it definitely deserves it, but I've had too much fun with it to do so. There's probably so much I missed, like annoying perks, clueless devs, annoying grinding (hot take I don't think the bloodpoint grinding is TOO bad) but my fingers are getting tired. If you've read this whole thing, you just wasted like five minutes. Buy this game if you have a lot of time to kill and don't stoop to the level of toxic survivors. Just remember, kill em with kindness. Anyway I hope this helped, I'd rate this game a 5/10 objectively, but in my opinion it's a solid 8/10.

te voy a resumir Dead by Daylight en pocas palabras es un juego donde puedes ser un supervivente o asesino, los superviviventes escapan del asesino y el asesino tiene que matar a los supervivientes( este ultimo teniendo todas las ventajas porsupuesto) es un juego repetitivo con pocos mapas y donde siempre tienes que hacer lo mismo una y otra y otra vez , cabe destacar que cada un corto periodo de tiempo salen asesinos mas rotos para que tu experiencia de juego como superviviente sea cada vez peor , otra cosa no menor es que es un juego donde absolutamente todo se compra ya sea atuendos, supervivientes, asesinos, etc. Como coclusion si quieres un juego aburrido y monotono donde tengas que comprar absolutamente todo para que tu experiencia de juego pueda ser mejor Dead by Daylight es para ti
